summary: Brick Pollitt (Paul Newman), an alcoholic ex-football player, drinks his days away and resists the affections of his wife, Maggie (Dame Elizabeth Taylor). His reunion with his father, Big Daddy (Burl Ives), who is dying of cancer, jogs a host of memories and revelations for both father and son.
cast: Elizabeth Taylor|Paul Newman|Burl Ives|Jack Carson|Judith Anderson|Madeleine Sherwood|Larry Gates|Vaughn Taylor|Zelda Cleaver|Brian Corcoran|Hugh Corcoran|Kevin Corcoran|Patty Ann Gerrity|Bobby Johnson|Walter Merrill|Deborah Miller|Robert 'Rusty' Stevens|Vince Townsend Jr.|Jeane Wood
keywords: southern gothic|husband wife relationship|homosexuality|based on play|ex football player
title: La gata sobre el tejado de zinc
